Xsurv 0.1.0
  • Reference
  • Articles
    • Basic work flow

Reference

All functions

Cox_lgb_deviance_func()

Cox deviance for Lgb

Cox_lgb_obj()

Cox objective func for Lgb

Cox_xgb_deviance_func()

Cox deviance for xgb

Xsurv()

This function can fit the survival data with different model including xgboost,lightgbm,random forests, and gbm.

Xsurv.cv()

This function can use cv to automatically tuning the paramter to fit the survival model for xgboost and lightgbm.

Xsurv_predict()

This function allows you to transform survival prediction from risk score to survival time.

Xsurv_predict_sv()

This function allows you to predict a patient's survival curve

Xsurv_sim_data()

This function allows you to find risk level automatically with lgbcv object.

cidx_lgb_deviance_func()

Cindex deviance for Lgb

cidx_lgb_func()

C-index for Lgb

cidx_lgb_obj()

Cindex objective func for Lgb

cidx_xgb_deviance_func()

Cindex deviance for xgb

cidx_xgb_func()

C-index for xgb

cidx_xgb_obj()

Cindex objective func for xgb

leaf_tf()

Transform feature space to high dimension leaf space for xgb or lgb model

leaf_xgb()

Transform feature space to high dimension leaf space for xgb model

lgb.sur()

Fitting lgb model

sim_surv_tree()

Simple survival tree

surv_risk_aut()

Automatically define survival risk with xgb or lgb model

surv_risk_aut_gbm()

Automatically define survival risk with gbm model

surv_risk_aut_rf()

Automatically define survival risk with rf model

surv_risk_m()

Manually define survival risk with xgb or lgb model

xgb.sur()

Fitting xgb model
